creator: malaliganesh@gmail.com
text:
Created attachment 32652
The above error is captured in the screen shot

Hi Team,

Am getting error server/util_pcre.c:137: undefined reference to `pcre_info' while installing httpd-2.4.12 

I am using below command to configure httpd-2.4.12 it is successful, But getting error while executing the "make" command

./configure --prefix=/SVN01prod/subversion/programs/apache-httpd-2.4.12 --with-included-apr --with-ssl=/SVN01prod/subversion/programs/openssl-0.9.8zc --with-pcre=/SVN01prod/subversion/programs/pcre-8.36 --enable-dav --enable-dav-fs --enable-isapi --enable-authn-anon --enable-authn-alias --with-ldap --enable-authnz-ldap --enable-ldap --enable-rewrite --enable-ssl --enable-so

Am using pcre-8.36 for this.

creator: malaliganesh@gmail.com
text: Any one please help in resolving this issue.

creator: ylavic.dev@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to ganesh malali from comment #1)
> Any one please help in resolving this issue.

This bugzilla is for reporting bugs, not support.
Please ask the mailing list (users@httpd.apache.org), where you should get help.

creator: malaliganesh@gmail.com
text:
Hi Yann,

Yes am reporting a bug itself. The bug is below.

Hi Team,

Am getting error server/util_pcre.c:137: undefined reference to `pcre_info' while installing httpd-2.4.12 

I am using below command to configure httpd-2.4.12 it is successful, But getting error while executing the "make" command

creator: ylavic.dev@gmail.com
text:
(In reply to ganesh malali from comment #3)
> 
> Yes am reporting a bug itself. The bug is below.

pcre_info() is not used in httpd since version 2.4.1 (and you report a build issue with 2.4.12).

You may be doing something wrong (and users@ may help)...
